long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Designed with precision for the dedicated team at ÖMER Teknoloji, this extension streamlines daily business operations by offering seamless currency conversion. While tailored to meet the specific needs of the ÖMER Teknoloji Team, we're pleased to extend its capabilities to the broader community. All users are cordially invited to experience its features, completely free of charge, with no obligations attached. We value the trust you place in our tools and are always eager to hear feedback to enhance user experience."
